channel.title: Web Development on

item.title: Angular Starter Kit with OpendID Connect (Authorization Code Flow)
item.description: We will get a started app with angular that authenticate itselfs through an OpenID Connect on the nodejs side using Authorization code flow. Disclaimer: I assume the reader understands how to write html/scss and start a basic angular-app or any webpack based site like Vue or Reactjs before reading this blog. If not please visit getting started with angular before going on!Disclaimer: I assume the reader understands how to write html/scss and start a basic angular-app or any webpack based site like Vue or Reactjs before reading this blog.
